name: Better MG Statusbar
description:
I'm a MonstersGame player (http://www.monstersgame.it/?ac=vid&vid=16000126). 
Recently the developer has introduced a bottom bar that displays user stats. Unfortunately the bar is quite long so on small screen (1024x768) you can get some overlapping element (see the RED RECTANGLE AREA in the screenshots below)

This style gives a better element spacing to the game bottom bar.
